name: stream-to-etag
author: Dan Lynch <pyramation@gmail.com>
description: Calculates Etag/S3 MD5 sum given a readable stream. Uses the same algorithm that S3 uses to calculate the ETag.

scripts.build: npm run clean; tsc; tsc -p tsconfig.esm.json; npm run copy
scripts.build:dev: npm run clean; tsc --declarationMap; tsc -p tsconfig.esm.json; npm run copy
